title: Gospel order revived being an answer to a book lately set forth by ... Increase Mather ... entituled, The order of the gospel, &c ... / by sundry ministers of the gospel in New England.
author: Colman, Benjamin, 1673-1747.
notes: Collaboration on authorship has been ascribed at various times to Timothy Woolbridge, Benjamin Colman, Simon Bradstreet and Ebenezer Pemberton.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
